entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
